## {{< fa book >}} Resources

#### Tidy data

-   [Tidy data](https://vita.had.co.nz/papers/tidy-data.html), Hadley Wickham
-   [Open Refine](https://openrefine.org/), for data cleaning

#### Text data

-   [Tulane libguide on text data](https://libguides.tulane.edu/c.php?g=502551&p=10202693)
-   [St Thomas libguide on text data](https://libguides.stthomas.edu/digital_humanities/text)
-   [Gendered Language in Teacher Reviews](https://benschmidt.org/profGender), Ben Schmidt
-   [The trouble with sentiment analysis](https://makingnoiseandhearingthings.com/2022/04/19/the-trouble-with-sentiment-analysis/), Rachel Tatman
-   [An overview of ethical considerations in TDM](https://berkeley.pressbooks.pub/buildinglltdm/chapter/ethics/), Stacy Reardon; Rachael Samberg; and Timothy Vollmer
-   [Text processing problems with non-English languages](https://medium.com/krakensystems-blog/text-processing-problems-with-non-english-languages-82822d0945dd), Tena BeliniÄ‡

#### Data ethics

-   [Global Indigenous Data Alliance](https://www.gida-global.org/)
-   [Turning Data Around](https://medium.com/memo-random/turning-data-around-7acea1f7479c), Jer Thorp
-   [Manifesto for data practices](https://datapractices.org/manifesto/)
-   [Integrated ethics labs](https://integratedethicslabs.org/labs-overview/) for computer and data science
